SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.distributed

Interface Server

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ServerImpl, ServerStub
public interface Server extends Remote
The Server class represents an Interface for ServerImpl and ServerStub classes. It contains methods to handle game lobbies and player registration and updates.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    register(Client client, String nickname)
    Registers a client with his nickname, adds the client to the controller's client List and as model listener
    void
    startGame()
    Makes a player join a new match lobby or an unfinished match
    void
    update(Client client, List<int[]> coords, Integer column)
    Update method with all the player's choices (coordinates, column) to update the controller and the matchLog
    void
    update(List<String> notificationList)
    Update method with a String List containing all notifications

  • Method Details

    • startGame

      void startGame() throws RemoteException
      Makes a player join a new match lobby or an unfinished match
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the execution of method goes wrong

    • register

      void register(Client client, String nickname) throws RemoteException
      Registers a client with his nickname, adds the client to the controller's client List and as model listener
      Parameters:
      client - client to register
      nickname - player's nickname
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the execution of method goes wrong

    • update

      void update(Client client, List<int[]> coords, Integer column) throws RemoteException
      Update method with all the player's choices (coordinates, column) to update the controller and the matchLog
      Parameters:
      client - the choosing player
      coords - coordinates chosen
      column - the shelf column chosen
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the execution of a remote method goes wrong

    • update

      void update(List<String> notificationList) throws RemoteException
      Update method with a String List containing all notifications
      Parameters:
      notificationList - the String List with notification messages
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the execution of a remote method call goes wrong
